channel.title: rC3 - Chris: AMA! - Spritely Project
channel.description:
[on behalf]
[date=2020-12-29 time=17:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] → [date=2020-12-29 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
---
Hi. I am Christopher Lemmer Webber. I've dedicated my life to expanding user freedom. I'm co-editor of the ActivityPub federation specification. For the last few years I've been working nonstop on trying to make the web safer through various network freedom projects.
This stuff takes a lot of time and energy: https://spritelyproject.org Your help can keep this work going. # Ask Me Anything!
# [Join via jitsi](https://meet.jit.si/ScatteredConsequencesActRegardless) --- If you don't have a ticket, you can ask you questions by sending a post in the fediverse to [@activitypub@gup.pe](https://gup.pe/u/activitypub) or in IRC [#social](https://webchat.freenode.net/#social) on freenode …
![](upload://unaD3x1YM9fMQ82Xfc800fdIQVy.jpeg)

2020-12-29T16:00:00Z → 2020-12-29T17:00:00Z

Hi. I am Christopher Lemmer Webber.
I’ve dedicated my life to expanding user freedom. I’m co-editor of the ActivityPub federation specification.
For the last few years I’ve been working nonstop on trying to make the web safer through various network freedom projects.

This stuff takes a lot of time and energy:

spritelyproject.org

Spritely


Your help can keep this work going.

Ask Me Anything!

Join via jitsi

If you don’t have a ticket, you can ask you questions by sending a post in the fediverse to @activitypub@gup.pe or in IRC #social on freenode …
